text: at first glance it looks like a fairly unremarkable watercolor of a woman with soft brown curls peeking from her white bonnet . first impressions can be wrong . this painting of jane austen , the author behind famous novels  pride and prejudice  and  sense and sensibility ,  has sold at auction for # 164,500 -lrb- $ 270,000 -rrb- . it 's the same image which is set to grace # 10 notes across britain , from 2017 . the painting was commissioned by the victorian novelist 's nephew in 1869 , and was sold by auction house sotheby 's to an anonymous private collector . but how well do you know your female authors ? would you know the difference between an image of austen and other renowned women writers ? take our quiz to find out .
summary: jane austen portrait sells for $ 270k at sotheby 's auction .   version of famous author will appear on # 10 notes from 2017 .   how well do you know other female authors ? take our quiz .
